name: Digital Forensic Methods
description: Investigative techniques for analyzing digital artifacts and cybercrime evidence.

cards.title: Memory Forensics & Live System Analysis
cards.description: Extracting volatile data from compromised systems for forensic analysis.
bulletpoints: Use Volatility and Rekall to extract forensic artifacts from RAM
Identify running processes, open network connections, and active malware
Detect and analyze rootkits, trojans, and fileless malware using memory dumps

cards.title: Log Analysis & Event Correlation
cards.description: Using system logs and event correlation to trace cyber incidents.
bulletpoints: Monitor Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) platforms like Splunk, ELK Stack, and Graylog
Correlate logs from endpoints, firewalls, and cloud environments
Identify indicators of compromise (IoCs) such as unauthorized access and data exfiltration

cards.title: Disk Forensics & Data Recovery
cards.description: Recovering, analyzing, and validating data from storage devices.
bulletpoints: Use Autopsy and The Sleuth Kit (TSK) for filesystem analysis
Recover deleted files and partitions using FTK Imager and TestDisk
Extract evidence from NTFS, FAT32, and exFAT filesystems

cards.title: Malware Forensics & Reverse Engineering
cards.description: Investigating and dissecting malicious software for forensic analysis.
bulletpoints: Use IDA Pro, Ghidra, and Radare2 for static binary analysis
Analyze malware behavior in a controlled environment using Cuckoo Sandbox
Extract Indicators of Compromise (IoCs) from infected systems using YARA rules

cards.title: Network Traffic Analysis & Forensic Investigation
cards.description: Capturing and analyzing network traffic for evidence of cyber intrusions.
bulletpoints: Use Wireshark and Zeek (Bro) to inspect packets and detect anomalies
Reconstruct network sessions and analyze suspicious traffic patterns
Identify unauthorized access and data exfiltration through Deep Packet Inspection (DPI)

cards.title: Cloud Forensics & Virtual Environment Analysis
bulletpoints: Analyze AWS CloudTrail, Azure Security Center, and Google Cloud Logging for forensic evidence
Identify misconfigured cloud storage buckets and leaked credentials
Use forensic snapshots to investigate compromised virtual machines

cards.title: Mobile Device Forensics
cards.description: Extracting forensic data from smartphones and tablets.
bulletpoints: Use tools like Cellebrite UFED and Magnet AXIOM for data extraction
Recover deleted messages, call logs, and GPS history from Android and iOS devices
Analyze application artifacts from WhatsApp, Signal, and Telegram

cards.title: USB Device & External Media Forensics
cards.description: Investigating forensic artifacts from removable storage devices.
bulletpoints: Analyze USB device history using Windows registry keys
Recover deleted files from USB drives using Photorec and Foremost
Use MFT (Master File Table) analysis to track data transfers

cards.title: Rootkit Detection & Stealth Malware Analysis
cards.description: Identifying advanced persistent threats (APTs) hiding in system processes.
bulletpoints: Use GMER and RootkitRevealer to detect kernel-level rootkits
Analyze Windows API hooks and system call modifications
Dump and analyze hidden processes using Volatility plugins

cards.title: File Metadata & Document Forensics
cards.description: Extracting hidden metadata from documents and images.
bulletpoints: Use ExifTool to analyze metadata from images, PDFs, and office documents
Identify authorship, timestamps, and geolocation data
Detect digital forgeries and manipulated files

cards.title: Email Header Analysis & Phishing Forensics
cards.description: Investigating malicious email campaigns and spear-phishing attacks.
bulletpoints: Extract and analyze email headers using tools like MXToolbox and IPVoid
Trace email spoofing and DKIM/SPF misconfigurations
Identify phishing links and attachments using VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis

cards.title: Dark Web & Tor Network Forensics
cards.description: Investigating cybercriminal activity on the Tor network.
bulletpoints: Use Tor network traffic analysis to identify illicit activities
Monitor cryptocurrency transactions linked to dark web markets
Extract intelligence from dark web forums using DarkOwl and Flashpoint

cards.title: Data Exfiltration Detection & Analysis
cards.description: Investigating unauthorized data transfers and leaks.
bulletpoints: Monitor SIEM solutions for suspicious data transfers
Use NetFlow and Deep Packet Inspection (DPI) to detect covert channels
Analyze DNS tunneling, encrypted payloads, and steganographic techniques

cards.title: Forensic Timeline Reconstruction
cards.description: Reconstructing cyber incidents using timestamps and logs.
bulletpoints: Use Plaso and log2timeline to generate forensic timelines
Correlate system events, network traffic, and file modifications
Analyze timestamp anomalies to detect anti-forensic techniques
